requiredEquipmentExplanation: The workout video titled "15 MIN TOTAL BEGINNER FULL BODY WORKOUT (No Repeats, No Equipment, No Jumping)" explicitly states both in the title and the description that no equipment is needed to perform the exercises. The tags also reinforce this by including phrases like "no equipment workout," "beginner workout no equipment," and "no equipment full body workout." Additionally, user comments indicate the effectiveness of the workout using bodyweight alone. Although the description includes a link to a mat purchase, it is not presented as a requirement for this specific workout, thus confirming that the workout is designed to be completed without any equipment.
